diseases.name: Common Cold
diseases.symptoms: Runny nose, sneezing, sore throat, cough
ayurvedic_recommendations: Try honey and tulsi (basil) for soothing the throat.
recommendations: Use a humidifier to ease congestion.

diseases.name: Influenza (Flu)
ayurvedic_recommendations: Take herbal preparations like Ayush Kwath.
Consume turmeric milk for its anti-inflammatory properties.
recommendations: Stay home to prevent spreading the virus.

diseases.name: Stomach Flu
ayurvedic_recommendations: Use buttermilk with a pinch of roasted cumin seeds.
Chew fennel seeds for digestive relief.
recommendations: Drink clear fluids to stay hydrated.
